titles.title: Facilitating Main Street Offerings Act
Facilitating Main Street Offerings Act

A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933 to define secondary offerings of Regulation A tier 2 securities as covered securities for purposes of an exemption from State regulation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Facilitating Main Street Offerings Act
This bill exempts certain securities issued under Regulation A from state regulation of secondary transactions. Regulation A exempts small issues of securities from registration requirements.
